trans-unit.source: A function for converting Gregorian calendar dates to Julian dates, and another function for converting Julian calendar dates to Julian dates are defined. Two functions for the reverse calculations are also defined.
trans-unit.target: 定义了一个将公历日期转换为农历日期的函数,以及另一个将农历日期转换为农历日期的函数。还定义了两个反向计算的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to test if a given Gregorian calendar year is a leap year is also defined.
trans-unit.target: 还定义了一个测试给定公历年是否为闰年的函数。

trans-unit.source: A good amount of the code is based on the excellent TPM C library by Jeffrey W. Percival.
trans-unit.target: 大量代码基于Jeffrey W. Percival出色的TPM C库。

trans-unit.source: All the above functions are “proleptic”. This means that they work for dates on which the concerned calendar is not valid. For example, Gregorian calendar was not used prior to around October 1582.
trans-unit.target: 以上所有功能都是“多用的”。这意味着它们适用于相关日历无效的日期。例如，在1582年10月前后未使用公历。

trans-unit.source: Different regions of the world switched to Gregorian calendar from Julian calendar on different dates. Having separate functions for Julian and Gregorian calendars allow maximum flexibility in choosing the relevant calendar.
trans-unit.target: 世界上不同的地区在不同的日期从朱利安历转为格里高利历。分开朱利安历和格里高利历的功能,可以最大限度地灵活选择相关日历。

trans-unit.source: For comments and suggestions, email to user
trans-unit.target: 如有意见和建议,请发邮件给用户

trans-unit.source: JD for zero point of MJD, and MJD for JD2000.0:

Julian dates are stored in two floating point numbers (double). Julian dates, and Modified Julian dates, are large numbers. If only one number is used, then the precision of the time stored is limited. Using two numbers, time can be split in a manner that will allow maximum precision. For example, the first number could be the Julian date for the beginning of a day and the second number could be the fractional day. Calculations that need the latter part can now work with maximum precision.
trans-unit.target: 儒略日期是以两个浮点数(双数)存储的。朱利安日期和修正朱利安日期都是大数。如果只使用一个数字,那么存储时间的精度是有限的。使用两个数字,时间可以以一种允许最大精度的方式被分割。例如,第一个数字可以是一天开始的朱利安日期,第二个数字可以是分数日。现在,需要后一部分的计算可以以最大精度工作。

trans-unit.source: Julian dates from proleptic Gregorian and Julian calendars.
trans-unit.target: 朱利安日期从proleptic格里高利历和朱利安历。

trans-unit.source: Some examples are given below. For more information see https://oneau.wordpress.com/2011/08/30/jdcal/.
trans-unit.target: 下面给出一些示例。有关更多信息，请参见 https://oneau.wordpress.com/2011/08/30/jdcal/。

trans-unit.source: The inspiration to split Julian dates into two numbers came from the IAU SOFA C library. No code or algorithm from the SOFA library is used in
trans-unit.target: 从IAU SOFA C库中获取朱利安日期分成两个数字的灵感 。SOFA库中没有使用任何代码或算法

trans-unit.source: The module can be installed using pip or easy_install:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用pip或easy_install来安装该模块：

trans-unit.source: This module contains functions for converting between Julian dates and calendar dates.
trans-unit.target: 这个模块包含了在Julian日期和日历日期之间进行转换的功能。

trans-unit.source: Zero point of Modified Julian Date (MJD) and the MJD of 2000/1/1 12:00:00 are also given as module level constants.
trans-unit.target: 修正朱利安日期(MJD)的零点和2000/1/1 12:00:00的MJD也作为模块级常数给出。
